::Blacknighmare::

Blacknigthmare walked close to Proto1000  and said 
amasing "Awesome... Can you do other else?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  Proto1000 reformed in the shape of the dead bots
> body.(Destructor) He looked at the bot with a cold
> stare. He had to wait to speak so he could mimic his
> voice.
> --- Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > ::DarkFate/Blacknightmare/::
> > 
> > Darkfate frowned and flew in his beast mode (A
> > Dragon with 5 heads), 
> > and landed along side the protophorm. He changed to
> > robot mode, with 
> > reveals a strong, red-golden, 12 feet body. His
> > main-dragon head 
> > fellover his chest, revealing this robot's head. His
> > other heads 
> > moved towards his chest and they put thier
> > snake-like heads together 
> > the main. Even in his Robot mode Darkfate kept his
> > Dragon's tail and 
> > wings (That are like bat's)
> > 
> > Blacknightmare arrived first and landed near of the
> > place were 
> > protphorm was.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> > >  The proto1000 turned to its liquid form and
> > flowed down through 
> > the grass as 
> > > the bots flew closer. It tried to hide itself
> > until thier 
> > intentions where 
> > > known.
> >
